title: If Neil Young had not joined Crosby Stills and Nash, who would have been a good fourth member? - Quora

response.answer_text: Good question, as I never understood the addition of Neil. The other 3 sing so perfectly and beautifully. I love Neil, but only solo. While his voice has value, to me it adds zero value to the amazing harmonies of CS&N. As I typed this, the perfect name came to me. James Taylor However, James seems very sweet, and not drama prone. During most of their years, both Crosby and Stills were raging narcissist dbags. In that case… if you want a golden voice talent who is also can be a raging dick… Paul Simon.

They were pretty good on their own. I don’t think he was their first choice, but it is hard to imagine anyone else now. I think they considered a few people like Hendrix and others, but the people they wanted were doing too well on their own. I wonder how Joni Mitchell would have blended in with them. If you haven’t seen these interviews, they might be of interest to you. hudsonunionsociety
